question:
Consider the following statements about the National Agriculture Market (NAM):
  1. It acts as a pan-India electronic trading portal for farm produce
  2. National Bank for Agriculture and Rural Development (NABARD) is the lead promoter of NAM
Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation: <u>First statement is correct</u>. National Agriculture Market (NAM) acts as a pan-India electronic trading portal for farm produce which creates a unified national market for agricultural commodities by integrating the existing Agriculture Produce Market Committee (APMC) markets. <u>Second statement is incorrect</u> because Small Farmers Agribusiness Consortium (SFAC) is the lead promoter of NAM and not NABARD. SFAC is a registered society of Department of Agriculture, Cooperation & Farmersâ€™ Welfare (DAC&FW) under Ministry of Agriculture and Farmer Welfare.
